info.name: Admin API
info.description:
Medusa Admin API endpoints for administrative operations including products, orders, customers, and users management. These endpoints require authentication via JWT token.

## Authentication

All requests in this collection require a valid JWT token. Set the `jwt_token` environment variable with your admin authentication token before making requests.

To obtain a JWT token:
1. POST to /admin/auth with admin credentials
2. Copy the token from the response
3. Set it as the `jwt_token` environment variable

The collection automatically includes the Authorization header with Bearer token for all requests.

item.name: Products
item.description: Product management endpoints for creating, updating, and listing products in the admin panel

item.name: List Products
item.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all products in the store. Supports filtering, sorting, and pagination. Returns detailed product information including variants, options, and metadata.

response.name: Success Response

item.name: Create Product
item.description: Creates a new product in the store. Requires product title at minimum. Can include variants, options, images, and other product details.

response.name: Success Response

item.name: Orders
item.description: Order management endpoints for viewing and managing customer orders

item.name: List Orders
item.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all orders. Supports filtering by status, customer, date range, and other attributes. Returns order details including items, shipping, and payment information.

item.name: Customers
item.description: Customer management endpoints for viewing and managing customer accounts

item.name: List Customers
item.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all customers. Supports filtering by email, name, and other attributes. Returns customer details including contact information and order history summary.

item.name: Users
item.description: Admin user management endpoints for creating and managing admin accounts

item.name: List Users
item.description: Retrieves a list of all admin users. Returns user details including email, role, and permissions. Only accessible by users with appropriate admin privileges.

item.name: Create User
item.description: Creates a new admin user account. Requires email and password. Can optionally specify role and other user details. The new user will receive an invitation email.
